metadata.title: CVE-2019-13962 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: lavc_CopyPicture in modules/codec/avcodec/video.c in VideoLAN VLC media player through 3.0.7 has a heap-based buffer over-read because it does not properly validate the width and height.

criterions.comment: vlc package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.8-2').
